alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:21PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, Clay, Randolph, northwestern Calhoun, Quitman and southwestern Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 121 PM EDT/1221 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Osco to 6 miles northeast of Blakely. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Dawson, Cuthbert, Edison, Shellman, Bellville, Bluffton, Wire Bridge, Carnegie, Watson Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Dawson Municipal A/P, Thomas Mill Creek, Hatcher, Morris, Bethel, Suttons Corner and Springvale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
